content: the all together now crochet granny stripe blanket is the perfect blanket to use up sock scraps use up stash yarn buy some full skeins and minis skeins from some favorite dyers the sky is the limit here **pattern details** pattern instructions are easy to follow and very beginner friendly **crochet hook used** 3 5mm/e **size** adjustable several size options are listed in the pattern **yarn** fingering weight yarn **language** written in u s terms **pattern discount codes ** save10 - purchase 3+ patterns and get 10% off save15 - purchase 5+ patterns and get 15% off save20 - purchase 8+ patterns and get 20% off **you can find me in the following places ** www pinterest com/whiletheydream www instagram com/while they dream www facebook com/while they dream *this is a pdf pattern only not a physical item pattern will be available for instant download via checkout screen & automatic email upon payment all sales are final with digital downloads *
